title: Pods vs Bubbles
alt: Canada's travel restrictions on the US are 99% about keeping out COVID and 1% about keeping out people who say 'pod.'
transcript:
[Cueball is walking to the right with Megan.  He has his index finger raised dramatically.]
Cueball: I refuse to bubble with anyone who calls it a "pod" and not a "bubble".[Caption below the panel]:
This is probably my opinion that would have sounded the most incoherent to me a year ago.
